title: 2006 President's Cup (Maldives)
text:
The 2006 President's Cup was the 56th season of the <a href="President%27s%20Cup%20%28Maldives%29">President's Cup</a>, a knock-out competition for <a href="Maldives">Maldives</a>' top 4 <a href="association%20football">football</a> clubs. <a href="Victory%20Sports%20Club">Victory Sports Club</a> were the defending champions, having defeated <a href="New%20Radiant%20SC">New Radiant</a> in <a href="2005%20President%27s%20Cup%20%28Maldives%29">last season's</a> <a href="2005%20President%27s%20Cup%20%28Maldives%29%20Final">final</a>.
Broadcasting rights.
The broadcasting rights for all the matches of 2006 Maldives President's Cup were given to the <a href="Television%20Maldives">Television Maldives</a>.
Qualifier.
Top 4 teams at the end of <a href="2006%20Dhivehi%20League">2006 Dhivehi League</a> will be qualified for the President's Cup.
